Hello kia ye data show hura gy ?

Asharib ! Aapni Choice sy Reply nahi Mery Msg ky Mutabiq each working ka point by point reply/Working kro & Read Fahad Msg.

Whatsapp # Internal Office communication Ai Project mei bugs FIX & refresh krne per msg update ho rahe hai SET KRO.Wati jesay option add Krdo os main jis sy dashboard per chat ho sakay.

&

Fahad/Haadi ky saath Head Office/5 Star ky Sab Staff ko msgs test & Project ke App bhi Mery Mobile mei install & Ready to use setup final krky do.

Chat Gpt ke File sy Whatsapp APi Ka Oracle software mei procedure study krky Azeem ka System Hack & Wati waly Whatsapp Api sy Clients ko Payment ky msg send kro.templet already approved hy.

&

kerlya mei issue hy tu AI CALL CENTRE REVELIANCE AI CHAT GPT ke File study kro,10 other services ke details hai.not eleven labs.Current AI Call Centre mostly ready made & limited 50-100 Calls per day ka IP Telephonic communication setup hy,cosider it like PTCL ON IP & DISCUSS WITH FAHAD.

ORIGNAL AI CALL CENTRE REVILIANCE AI PER BASED & FOR UPTO 1,000 USERS PER DAY HY.SATURDAY SY AI REBELIANCE CALL CENTRE PER WORKING START KRO.

NOTE :

ZOHO SY SALES LEADS PER WORK NAHI KRO.PAHLY INTERNAL OFFICE COMMUNICATION PROJECT,ORACLE SOFTWARE HACK KRKY WATI WHATSAPP API SET & IP PHONE SET UP FINAL Kro
